items.title: We are asking for the support of the community, since the...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We are asking for the support of the community, since the solidarity meals are to support each immigrant family in the sanctuary, this time it was the turn of the Blanco Martínez family since the covid situation has reduced Carlos Blanco's hours in the restaurant that works and will be making pupusas for the rent since the covid has affected many families, that is why this program has been created. share please

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Yessenia is selling pupusas for pickup on December 5 in Denver, Boulder, or Aurora. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

items.title: Yessenia is selling pupusas on December 5th! Pickup in Denver,...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Aurora, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling pupusas on December 5th! Pickup in Denver, Boulder, and Aurora. They’re $3 a piece, vegetarian options available, and 100% gluten free. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co (link in bio)

items.title: Today we’re thankful for your support of the Solidarity Meals...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is with Carlo Blanco and 2 others in Denver, Colorado.

Today we’re thankful for your support of the Solidarity Meals program since we launched it last May. Pictured here are Yessenia, Carlos, and Jeanette making turkey dinners, pozole, and punch. Many of these meals were distributed to unhoused folks in Denver today, and were incredibly grateful to the people who partnered with us to make that possible. While Thanksgiving is still taught in schools as a celebration of the help that Native American tribes offered white settlers, we know that this is a whitewashed retelling of the genocide against Indigenous people, violence that continues today. You can check the link in our bio for a zine from @seedingsovereignty about Indigenous resistance and ways to support. Solidarity with our Indigenous siblings today and every day.

items.title: Ordered tamales? Pickup is 1:00 - 3:00 in Denver, Boulder, and...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Ordered tamales? Pickup is 1:00 - 3:00 in Denver, Boulder, and Aurora.

Denver: 1400 N Lafayette St
Boulder: 5001 Pennsylvania Ave
Aurora: 312 Del Mar Cir

...

We’ll also be selling masks and agua fresca in Denver. Masks will also be available in Boulder.
See you soon!

items.title: only 3 days left to close the order
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

only 3 days left to close the order

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

We’re selling food for Thanksgiving including a turkey package with sides, chicken pozole, drinks & desserts. You can order at solidaritythanksgiving.paperform.co We’re so thankful for your support of #solidaritymeals over the last six months. What are you grateful for?
